metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000018 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4., and 4.6 are vulnerable to a DOS attack in the replication status by using a specially crafted table name

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.6-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5').
